seo.title: Case Studies | Christian Varisco
seo.description: Discover how I've helped startups build successful products, raise funding, and scale their technical teams. Real results from real partnerships.

hero.subtitle: From early-stage ideas to market-ready products. Our customers include enterprises and startups across HR tech, fintech, legal tech, and more.

footerCTA.subtitle: Let's discuss how I can help you achieve your technical and business goals.

items.shortDescription: Lexroom uses AI to revolutionize legal research: it analyzes documents, finds precedents, and generates answers.

testimonial.quote: Christian helped us a lot to design an initial product development roadmap and to understand how to build the tech team.
testimonial.author: Martina Domenicali

seo.title: Lexroom.ai Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Lexroom.ai go from €500K pre-seed to €16M seed round in less than 2 years.

items.shortDescription: Talentware manages talent with skill-based AI: it maps real competencies and suggests careers and corporate successions.

testimonial.quote: Christian joined when we only had an idea and a no-code prototype. In less than two years, he helped us build not only the product, but the entire technology infrastructure.
testimonial.author: Giacomo Marchiori

seo.title: Talentware Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Talentware raise €1.2M in pre-seed and achieve ISO 27001 in just 4 months.

items.shortDescription: Pausetiv helps women navigate menopause with a medical approach, connecting patients with healthcare professionals.

testimonial.quote: Christian is not just a technical partner, but a true strategic partner. Beyond delivering with impeccable quality and on time, he combines technology and business aspects with transparency and exemplary team management.
testimonial.author: Clarice Pinto

seo.title: Pausetiv Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Pausetiv launch a professional medical platform in just 4 months.

items.shortDescription: Liquinvex is a premium wine marketplace where you can buy rare bottles, invest in wine, and sell online.

testimonial.quote: A competent, dynamic, and always available person. A fractional CTO as it should be!
testimonial.author: Riccardo Tripodi

seo.title: Liquinvex Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Liquinvex unblock in 1 week and raise €110K while getting into Nana Bianca accelerator.
